Package asteroid.check

This package contains to check the state of ASTNode instances

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Checker<T extends org.codehaus.groovy.ast.ASTNode>
    An instance of Checker should test whether an instance of ASTNode passes the assertion it represents or not.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppliedOnceTo<T extends org.codehaus.groovy.ast.AnnotatedNode>
    This checker makes sure a given AnnotationNode has only be applied once to a given set of nodes of a given type.
    ChecksBuilder
    Makes easier to concatenate a set of checkers.
    HasName
    This Checker checks whether a given MethodNode has the expected name of not.
    Result
    When a given Checker is processed through its Checker.accepts(ASTNode) method it will return a result containing whether the cheker failed or it passed, and the correspondent message to inform what was the problem.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Result.Status
    A checker Result

Package asteroid.check Description

This package contains to check the state of ASTNode instances
